name: Bed of Corn
description:
A short story about a corn merchant and his daughter, trying to make it in the world without a real home, other than a simple wooden carriage and the donkey that pulls it.

Note: The VN is very short, contains 3,748 words and lasts roughly 28.8 minutes.

CONTAINS:
- Original artwork (backgrounds, characters)
- Original story
- Two endings (chosen by the player)
- Special message from the developer at the end, delivered by an original character

You can get the art pack for free

If you'd like to support me and my projects:
https://ko-fi.com/W7W5WA0M
